title: Login
body: When I launch my client and enter my login information, it stays on the login screen with poppy staring into the distance forever. Can anyone help?

replies.body: Do you ever see any kind of errors at all like incorrect username/pass or authentication error? It could be that your firewalls don't recognize League anymore and are blocking it's connections to our login servers. Double [**check your firewall settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq3) or simply turn them off and check out if it works or not.
